name: A Good Gardener
description:
"A GOOD GARDENER" IS A GAME IN WHICH YOU ARE CHARGED WITH GROWING PLANTS FOR YOUR NATION'S WAR-EFFORT. AS THE DAYS PASS AND YOUR PLANTS GROW, REMEMBER TO REMEMBER WHO YOU ARE.

[CONTROLS - KEYBOARD]
WSAD or Arrow Keys: movement / menu selection
Mouse: look around
Spacebar or Left-click: interact / talk
Left Shift: kneel
ESC: pause menu

[CONTROLS - GAMEPAD]
Left Stick: movement
Right Stick: camera
A button or Left Trigger: interact / talk
Left Trigger: kneel
DPad/Left Stick: menu selection
Start: pause menu

(At this point we are unable to test the Mac/Linux controller support. If it doesn't work, please let us know!)
